website_summaries.verdict: A premium tongue cleaner with a streamlined design that makes it easier to handle and reach the back of the tongue for thorough cleaning.
pros: Medical grade stainless steel is durable and naturally resistant to bacteria
Single handle allows for one-handed use
Slim head offers a deeper reach and prevents gagging
Smooth, curved edges are gentle and effective
Colored silicone bands prevent user mix-ups
cons: Some may prefer a wider head

customer_reviews.title: No morning breath=more morning sex.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's kinda gross. Whatever. This did more for my dental health than anything I've ever done. Just buy one. Zero tooth decay since I started. No morning breath=more morning sex.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoVagabond

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: My dentist reccomend a tung cleaner and I wanted one that was easy to clean and use. This is amazing and has been a total game changer for my oral health routine. I drink a lot of coffee and in general stuff likes to sit on my tung leaving a bad taste and bad breath. I have been able to finally control my bad breath and it has even helped with some of my dry mouth issues by keeping my tung cleaned out. Not sure how that works, but it does. If you haven't tried this, you should!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Breath
customer_reviews.text: I love my tongue sweeper. I know that sounds stupid but it is absolutely true. I use it daily. It gets all of the funk off my tongue and it gives me the freshest breath. I definitely notice when I haven’t used it. The best part is that it is sustainable, no more plastic to throw away. It is super sanitary because you can boil it to clean it- or throw it in the dish washer. One of the best purchases I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I reccomend this. It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that food is much richer tasting since I started scraping my tongue. It is possible I have become a better cook, and the timing is coincidental. If you are considering trying one of these, I recommend it. Takes a day to notice subtle changes. It take a week or so for tastes to get a little richer.
customer_reviews.author: Mac O'Roni

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as well as dollar store plastic tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago & have stuck with it on & off. My dollar store plastic tongue scraper worked so much better than this. It works, but I imagine there must be other metal ones that work better, I don't want to go back to plastic but the cheap one I had was a lot better than this one. This does seem like good quality though, other than having no sharp scraping side.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best Tongue Cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best tongue scrappers that I have bought. One side is a pretty smooth (for every day cleaning) and the other is a little sharper (for better cleaning). I have two personally. One for home and one when I go on travel. It is really strong and I don't have to worry about it breaking. My girlfriend also loves them and ask I get an extra for her travel kit. So far I have had them for at least 3 years and it still works a good as the first day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Necessary part of my tooth maintenance routine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I was so sad i lost my first one i got a couple years ago when traveling. So i bought 4 more! One for myself and 3 for gifts. It's got a nice edge on it that, based on your pressure, takes as much gunk off your tongue as you'd like. The head is a little smaller than i would like (and i have a small mouth) so it takes 2 or 3 passes. But it works SO much better than the plastic ones and bonus you can boil it to sterilize after being sick and it will last forever... if you dont loose it.
customer_reviews.author: Asta Stapp

customer_reviews.title: works great, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks sharp and is very sturdy. I use it without pressing down too hard on my tongue once a day, and it's amazing how much it gets off. I went from having a gross white coating in the back of my tongue to a nice healthy pink tongue in a little over a week. Now if I could just drink less coffee, my tongue would stay pink longer...
customer_reviews.author: Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived this long without this product. It is extremely compact, well made, and durable. I don't think I will need to purchase another one for the rest of my life unless I lose it. It does a really excellent job of cleaning my tongue and it makes your mouth feels so clean after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dals

customer_reviews.title: ... list on highly rated Amazon products and was not disappointed. I am one to spend more time on ...
customer_reviews.text: Made this purchase from seeing a list on highly rated Amazon products and was not disappointed. I am one to spend more time on my mouth than makeup during my morning routine. I use to brush vigorously for a 'red' clean tongue but this scrapper is healthier (toothbrush embed bacteria). Also a much better option over the plastic tongue scrappers.
customer_reviews.author: M Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and will last forever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tongue scraper I've used. I don't see any reason why I would need to purchase another one unless I lose this one. It's just sharp enough to do what it was meant to without irritation or a need to go over your tongue multiple times. It was engineered to last a lifetime which is pretty amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a plastic tongue scraper which I LOVED but was not available anymore. I tried others, but they just didn't have the right edge. I was hesitant with this metal one, thinking it would be too dull, but this has been great. I was surprised to really like the small size; it rarely makes me gag. Metal also is easy to clean and sanitize. So I am very happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product and super easy to use. I was worried that the edges would be sharp and hard to hold, but they are well rounded and it is easy to maneuver. Its very solid and really gets out a lot of gunk from your tongue. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fan

customer_reviews.title: For the motherland and cleaner breath
customer_reviews.text: After searching and searching, I was pleased as punch to find this screaming eagle USA-made gem. The design is really nice and since it’s resting place is nestled amongst my beautifully bottled face serums, I’m glad that it doesn’t detract from the expensive feng suit of my home spa. The material is sturdy, no bending or breaking. It’s effective in its task and embarrassingly more effective that my previous, frugal method of using my toothbrush. I like it so much, I’ve bought more for friends as gifts since nothing says I care like good oral hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crist

customer_reviews.title: This is needed in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tongue cleaner. This item should be sold with every toothbrush, passed out at every dentists office. Plastic tongue cleaners should be recycled and turned into something more useful because they are terrible for cleaning the tongue and should be replaced with this item. My tongue has never felt so clean and I cannot wait to get to the dentist to see what they say!
customer_reviews.author: Soledad

customer_reviews.title: Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Product is sitting at 900+ reviews for a reason.. it came exactly as pictured and it works. Be mindful that the color bands on the product itself was annoying to maintain and keep clean underneath, but that's just me nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: KTGiang

customer_reviews.title: actually does seem to improve breath
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the morning and evening before I brush my teeth. I generally vigorously rinse after, and in the evening I use mouthwash after. The first week or so of use this scraper always picked up some white gunk, but now it seems to pick up very little. This would suggest that I now have less gunk on the back of my tongue each day. I've also noticed my breath seems to be better in the morning than it used to be. I get a gag reflex while using this, so I now use one hand to pull my tongue out a bit, and use the other to do the scraping.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Not the best way.
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like the metal tongue scrapers compared to a regular tongue brush, just for the simple fact that when I went to scrape from back to front I felt like I kind of cut my tongue, although it did not bleed it felt like it did and I just didn't feel it wasn't the most efficient way to get the gunk off the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Troy G.

customer_reviews.title: Had this for a month or 2 now. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a month or 2 now. My girlfriend says it’s def helped my breath. I haven’t noticed any rust on it but I also dry it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: j ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I've used other types of tongue cleaners and this one seems to be the best reusable design so far. The scraping edge is not super sharp so it doesn't hurt my tongue but it isn't super dull where it hampers functionality. It's small and light and very easy to clean. It doesn't even cost that much more than the plastic ones I've used in the past which tend to crack or get nicks and dings on the scraping edge.
customer_reviews.author: RYZEN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how much more effective this is than brushing or using the back of “tongue scraper” toothbrushes. You’ll be amazed (disgusted) when you use it! Also, the surgical steel is sanitary and easy to clean (dishwasher safe).
customer_reviews.author: J. Step

customer_reviews.title: Do you really need this?
customer_reviews.text: If you have a sensitive gag reflex I get it, but this thing doesn't work as well as scrubbing. If you can stand to scrub your tongue, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for an alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I found this in stainless steel. I could virtually keep this forever. One time purchase. Soak in peroxide or hot water to clean periodically. That's all there is to it. Gives my tongue a great clean feeling! Easy to pack for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great personal tool
customer_reviews.text: Well made and useful. Much more effective than the plastic one I used before. I feel much more confident that my breath remains fresh after I’ve used the device
customer_reviews.author: Claude Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: You'll buy this for life.
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I was looking for something that was steel, easily cleanable and easy to disinfect. This fits all three requirements. Unless I lose it, I won't have to buy another for life. I also talked to the Tongue Sweeper company about the product and they are the nicest people. If you need a tongue sweeper, just stop here and buy this one and you won't have to waste time looking for another. Either way, you'll come back for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R

customer_reviews.title: Really does stop halitosis, use in front of a mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin but at least it's not plastic. Easy to clean and take with you which is why I got two. You need to use in front of a mirror so you do not get carried away and make your tongue bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer reporter

customer_reviews.title: If you need a tongue scrapper, get this one.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin piece of metal, a little thinner than I expected but it turns out to be a good thing because it does its job flawlessly and it very light and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: A Great Scraper
customer_reviews.text: This tongue cleaner is amazing. I used a plastic one prior to this one. I can definitely tell a difference. Just keep it away from water long term so it doesn't start to rush. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: First Lady

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how much this helps and I feel like it is very rough. I prefer the tongue brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H.

customer_reviews.title: Good tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: Nice form factor, does what it need to do without triggering gag reflex, just make sure to be gentle when applying your pressure, had a sore tongue from too much pressure. Only thing that sucks, wish I could have gotten red band on mine lol
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your hard earned money on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Zero sharp edge - zero scraping ability - too small. Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic tongue scrapers
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly gentle yet effective. I was surprised by how lightweight it is. I like that I received two in different colors so we can tell them apart. This product looks like it'll last for years.
customer_reviews.author: L. Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Must have dental device!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand and model since 2010 and it works better than all of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Virdell

customer_reviews.title: Better than the plasticky ones
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the silicone one I had before and stays cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campise

customer_reviews.title: Best Product !
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over 11 tongue scrapers/sweepers and they have all made me GAG! From all the different suggestions from my dentist, and trying to figure out which one would work ( the plastic ones are terrible by the way) This was going to be my last ditch effort, So I found myself doing all this research online regarding the stainless steel ones and up pops a link to Amazon ... Buying a tongue thingy online just sounded absurd but low and behold Amazon had just what I needed !
customer_reviews.author: btaylor

customer_reviews.title: My tongue's best time of the day
customer_reviews.text: Whenever it's tongue cleaning time, it is the best part of the day for my tongue which might change when I get myself a boyfriend, but until then this sleek and sturdy tongue cleaner holds the position of king of my tongue. My breath also smells fresh after - that's what she said! :)
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for everyone
customer_reviews.text: You want good or better breath? It’s simple, buy this, and use it every time before you brush your teeth. It will change your breath and your life, no hyperbole intended!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Bee

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but needs tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Good design and easy to keep clean. The edge was a little too rounded for me so I sharpened it up a bit for better scraping action which is teh point of the thing. Would have given five stars it it came sharp enough to actually scrape.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck E

customer_reviews.title: Should be part of your daily tooth-brushing regime.
customer_reviews.text: A scrapper goes a long way to keeping your mouth clean.
customer_reviews.author: TamTomTimTikki

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the smaller size. Some of the larger ones make me gag but this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Works well. My first ever tongue scraper but from the effectiveness, I can tell I’d be hard pressed to find a better alternative. Highly recommend. The product I never knew I needed but now can’t imagine not having.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than the plastic strips
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this. It works well and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Doubletake

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I’ve used a few of these and this one is by far the best! There may be cheaper ones but you’ll find yourself spending more replacing them over time, this one is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Chiho Lai

customer_reviews.title: You will not find anything better than this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool for the job: hygienic, smooth edges, sturdy like a surgeons tool, unbreakable, rinse off with water & that's it - will not grow bacteria, this will last a lifetime and still look new. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why people like this
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people like this. It doesn't clean my tongue completely. I'm MUCH better off cleaning my tongue with an electrical toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Cera Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Throw away the disposables and buy this little guy
customer_reviews.text: After testing out this tongue sweeper for a few weeks, I can tell you that I am more than satisfied with the product. The price was affordable and the item is extremely durable as opposed to the pretty flimsy plastic options you can purchase at just about any drug store. It is a bit smaller than I anticipated but still seems to provide a solid cleaning with very little discomfort in what can be a rather uncomfortable activity.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tongue scrapers I’ve found. Wished they weren’t so pricey. But they do work well.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean and smaller size so it worked better for a tongue piercing
customer_reviews.text: I loved how well it cleaned after use and made it much easier to clean around a new tongue piercing with being smaller in size and not cheap plastic like I was using before
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: felt an amazing the first few times I used it
customer_reviews.text: felt an amazing the first few times I used it, not not so sure of the big difference, but maybe my tongue's cleaner now, but I feel better when I use it as opposed to when I don't. haven't figured out if this is psychosomatic...
customer_reviews.author: Kawena

customer_reviews.title: Not soft on the tongue
customer_reviews.text: Far too rough for my tongue. Cut my tongue a bit so I returned this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: where were you all these years
customer_reviews.text: it works if you keep your brushes in a glass of peroxide just keep this there and do not remove the little bit that stays on helps quicken process
customer_reviews.author: Tom IH Scout

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased! It's easy to use and does a good job!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brown

customer_reviews.title: My previous plastic one did a MUCH better job. I woild not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Too small, does't scrape very well. My previous plastic one did a MUCH better job. I woild not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my husband and myself after reading about how effective these can be at combating bad breath. In short, we'll never live without it again! Love it! And LOVE that you can put it in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: AlohaLinds

customer_reviews.title: Worthy hygiene investment
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have braces, or are simply meticulous with your dental hygiene. Never going back to the disposable plastic ones...
customer_reviews.author: cmendes5

customer_reviews.title: I'm still not sure what the orange rubber band is for so I wish the instructions were a bit better in that regard
customer_reviews.text: I owned a plastic tongue scraper previously which had developed a slight crack in the rubber scraper section. It worked well for years, or so I thought... The metal cleans my tongue SO much more effectively, and it's far easier to clean. I'm still not sure what the orange rubber band is for so I wish the instructions were a bit better in that regard, but for scraping tongues it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The best there is
customer_reviews.text: Best tongue scraper ever. Definitely beats my old plastic one... and my odd kitchen spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: This is great. To me it seems way more hygenical than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. To me it seems way more hygenical than the plastic ones. Easy to clean and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs to have one!
customer_reviews.text: Best tongue scrapper ever! Does hurt the tongue as it removes a lot of bad stuff from tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemustang2000

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, better than getting tongue clean with tooth brush. I see this lasting a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A bathroom staple
customer_reviews.text: Once you try a tongue scraper, you'll be disgusted by how you used to live.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Narrower than expected and does not scrape as good as the silicone scrapers
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! the entire family has one and everyone loves these tongue sweeper the most - easy to travel with and awesome design.
customer_reviews.author: Azzo

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from this product, but I'm extremely pleased with it. I am shocked at how dramatically cleaner my mouth feels from adding this tongue sweeper to my oral hygiene routine. I had also expected this to be awkward and probably cause gagging (as a toothbrush can) but that is not the case. Overall, this product is simple and pleasant to use, effective, and easy to clean. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cassimie

customer_reviews.title: TOP of the TOP
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! After so many years using the plastic one, finally I found the professional one. So easy to use it... The best of the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tounge fresh breath!
customer_reviews.text: im a 24 year old that uses this to have fresh breath after brushing my teeth. This does scrape the gunk out and leaves my mouth feeling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: This is great since it is not made out of plastic and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great since it is not made out of plastic and will not eventually go bad and need to be replaced. I would recommend these over other tongue cleaners. This is easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: L Shi

customer_reviews.title: Shooookk
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life, I have a fissured tongue and this scraper is easy to use and effective, really prefer the stainless steel over the plastic ones (feels more hygienic and easier to clean off) and the copper ones (which i found rusts pretty soon)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: First scraper I have used
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, I guess. Easy to use and clean. Never used one before, so have nothing to compare it to.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but is painful, stopped using it after a few nights
customer_reviews.author: nck

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch tongue scraper!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this tongue scraper. Compared to the few others I've used before, I appreciate that this one is: -Stainless steel so it's easier to clean and extra durable -Curve shaped so it's more effective at scraping your tongue -Lightweight and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Not big.  Smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: IT is smaller than I expected. It works however I find the plastic scrapers to work much better and covers a bigger terriftory.

customer_reviews.title: Handle too short
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I gave it 3 stars because the handle is about inch and half shorter than plastic version.

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this works and it’s very well made.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & easy to clean! Because of it’s smaller size I can reach all the areas of my tongue easily. My tongue has never been so clean.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: More effective than the plastic tongue scrapers on the market

customer_reviews.title: I also like the stainless steel design
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time. I also like the stainless steel design, comfortable enough to use on the tongue and strong enough that it won't wear out or break like plastic tongue scrappers. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: WebManReview

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good and easy to use. Gets the job done!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent practical gift.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this thing. I give it as a gift! The scraper just works, plain and simple. Invest in yourself.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It does the job perfectly. It's amazing the amount of junk that builds up on the tongue. This takes it all off. I've never gagged using this. It's easy to use, and seems very safe. Perhaps I might have liked to have it cost a little less. It's a pretty simple piece of metal. But it seems worth it to me.

customer_reviews.title: Scrapes off all the goo that is you.
customer_reviews.text: My breath is the freshest it's ever been, but I've never been more disgusted with myself.

customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I will have to continue using the plastic. Steel is too small.

customer_reviews.title: Tongue scrapers of the world, unite!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, dishwasher safe, lasts longer than the plastic ones.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective

customer_reviews.text: We've tried different brands and they're mostly plastic. This is by far the best tongue sweeper we've purchased. It's more hygienic since it's stainless, the size is just right and the handle is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lacali

customer_reviews.title: Tongue cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different tongue cleaners over the years and the Tongue Sweeper is by far the best I have ever used. Really gets any hidden particles out of the tongue surface. Would buy again but that would only happen if this one gets lost. It should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

I wouldn't feel nearly as clean and confident without after trying compared to brushing the tongue and mouthwash alone.

customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I discover this years ago! This works wonderfully!

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to clean and sanitary. Sure prevents bad breath and makes for a healthier appearance.

customer_reviews.text: Works well to clean the tongue. Metal design means it will last a long time. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: yuji kosakowski

customer_reviews.title: Quality for just a little more.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you need it to. Worth spending a few extra bucks on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Tongue Sweeper Tongue Cleaner Model P Stainless Steel Tongue Scrapers - Tongue Scrapers for Adults and Kids, Made of Medical Grade Stainless Steel (1 Pack)
product_meta.description: Our Tongue Sweeper Model P is the only tongue cleaner used and recommended by leading Dental Schools and Hygiene Schools. It has an ultra-smooth edge with a patented sleek profile for easier use while minimizing the gag reflex. It is made of medical grade stainless steel and has a colored silicone ring for family personalization. Tongue Cleaning is proven to be the #1 method for fresh breath. If you suffer from Halitosis otherwise known as "Bad Breath" you should be incorporating daily tongue cleaning with our Quality Medical Grade Stainless Steel Tongue Scraper. Tongue Sweeper was one of the first products to hit the market promoting and addressing tongue cleaning: the Quality Metal and sleek design is a first of its kind.
feature_bullets: ELIMINATES BAD BREATH: Use Tongue Mate tongue scraper cleaner to remove the biofilm causing bad breath on your tongue guaranteeing a fresher and cleaner mouth without breaking the bank.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The tongue cleaner,Tongue Mate, is the newest addition to the Tongue Sweeper line of tongue cleaners. It has a polished cleaning edge for a gentle yet effective cleaning action and features a new age polymer handle.
MEDICAL GRADE STAINLESS STEEL: This tongue cleaner scraper, TongueMate, has a cleaning edge that is made of medical grade stainless steel instead of plastic for a lifetime guaranteed satisfaction.

KIND TO THE ENVIRONMENT: Because our TongueMate tongue scrapers are made with durable stainless steel and polymer handles this means the TongueMate is: sustainable, promotes zero waste, does not break, cleaning head does not degrade, therefore you will only need one for many years to come.

Proudly Made in the USA, unlike other tongue scrapers, ensuring and guaranteeing you a quality product we are proud to produce. This tongue scraper cleaner is dishwasher safe and comes in 5 fun colors for easy identification.
